title: Angular Workshop
description:
An insightful workshop on Angular presented by Flemming and Johannes from Nes Tech! At Nes Tech, we believe in the power of Angular to revolutionize web development. Flemming and Johannes, experts from Nes Tech's UI team, will share their passion for Angular and why it's essential for developers to explore its capabilities.

Flemming shares, "We are a small Danish company where the UI team is passionate about Angular and think it's a shame that developers don't know about it, but simply choose React as the default. This without having heard of Angular. My colleague and I would really like to change that by reaching out and telling a little about Angular."

No prior knowledge of Angular required! If you have any JavaScript experience and have the latest version of Node.js installed, bring your laptop if you want to code along. Otherwise, just turn up to watch and learn and expand your understanding of Angular.

Don't miss this opportunity to delve into the world of Angular and enhance your JavaScript skills!

title: Understand the mathematical magic behind encryption
description:
In this captivating presentation, Ole Tange delves into the intricate world of encryption, shedding light on its mathematical underpinnings. As we celebrate PI-DAY, join us for a journey through the fascinating realm where mathematics meets security.

Key Points:

    Understanding Magnitudes: Explore the enormity of numbers and their role in encryption.
    Two Common Types of Encryption: Differentiate between symmetric and asymmetric encryption techniques.
    Symmetric Encryption: Uncover the principles behind symmetric encryption.
    Asymmetric Encryption: Delve into the complexities of asymmetric encryption.
    Deciphering HTTPS: Learn how HTTPS operates to secure online communication.
    Hashing Demystified: Understand the concept and significance of hashing in encryption.
    Exploring Encryption Algorithms: Gain insights into AES, RSA, Elliptic Curves, McEliece, and Lattice-based encryption.
    The Quantum Computing Impact: Discover how quantum computing influences encryption.
    Modern Encryption Examples: Explore contemporary encryption methods shaping the digital landscape.
    Peeking into Calculations: Witness the mathematical intricacies underlying encryption algorithms.

Join us for a thought-provoking session followed by delectable strawberry pies as we commemorate PI-DAY. Let's unravel the secrets of encryption together!

title: AI Tools: New opportunities and threats you didn't know about a year ago.
description:
Our guest speaker is Ole Tange. He has worked in IT since 1992 as a network manager, programmer, security specialist and site reliability engineer. Today he is an IT policy advisor at PROSA.

As you know, artificial intelligence has made quantum leaps in recent years. You've probably heard of ChatGPT. But there are other AI tools as well: Image, audio, video and code generation, to name just a few of the possibilities that have opened up.

These possibilities and explorations can be overwhelming for newcomers. However, it is crucial to recognise and address the limitations and social risks while actively working to prevent negative consequences. This is precisely why we have chosen the following subject:

AI Tools: New opportunities and threats you didn't know about a year ago.

Since AI is a very broad topic, Ole has narrowed down his presentation to focus on specific topics. Those topics are as follows:

1. AI progress: Recent progress and ChatGPT

2. exploring the versatile toolbox of AI: images, audio, video and code.

3. the limits of AI and societal concerns

4. mitigating the adverse effects of AI.

title: Docker Workshop
description:
This workshop on Docker is being presented by Sofus, a consultant and trainer from Praqma, a company that specializes in DevOps and Agile practices. Sofus will be introducing the basics of Docker, a platform for creating, deploying, and running applications in containers, to the computer science students attending the workshop.

So what is Docker?

Docker is a platform that allows you to build, deploy, and run applications in containers. Containers are a lightweight, portable way to package and isolate applications and their dependencies. With Docker, you can easily move applications between development, test and production environments and ensure they run consistently across platforms.

One of the main benefits of Docker is that it makes it easier to manage dependencies between different parts of your application. For example, if your application relies on a particular version of a library, you can containerize that library along with your application to ensure that it runs correctly even if the library is updated or changed in other parts of the system.

In this workshop, we will cover the basics of Docker, including:

Creating and running containers

Creating and running images

Managing containers with Docker Compose

Networking and storage in Docker

Whether you're a beginner or already have experience with Docker, this workshop will give you a solid foundation of the technology and help you use it in your own projects.

Hope to see you there!

title: Discord Workshop
description:
You always dreamed of making your own DiscordBot?

Now you have the chance.

Come and see Jesper and Jörg on the 2nd of February from 12 to 15 in room 3.12.

It's for free!!

Agenda:

1. Introduction

2. What is a Discord Bot, and why do we want to use it?

3. Set up the required environment

4. Create a Discord Bot

5. Create different functionalities for the bot

6. Deploying the bot to with help of example Heroku or Glitch (not sure yet)

7. Conclusion

title: Advanced Docker Workshop
description: Advanced Docker Course with help of Praqma/Eficode, SchoolHacks and CPH Business Academy Lyngby

title: Advanced Git Workshop
description:
Take your Git skills to the next level with this advanced workshop.

 Learn advanced Git techniques, best practices, and how to leverage Git effectively in complex projects. Whether you're a seasoned developer or new to Git, this workshop will equip you with the tools and knowledge to streamline your workflow and collaborate more efficiently with your team. 

This workshop will be hands-on, with plenty of opportunities for participants to practice advanced Git techniques through interactive exercises and real-world examples.
